p: For the experimental assays, 100% essential oil and the major components were dissolved 1:10 in 100% dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO; Sigma-Aldrich) and diluted in a RPMI-1640 medium with L-glutamine plus 0.2% glucose and without sodium bicarbonate (Sigma-Aldrich, Rome, Italy), as previously described [ 11]. Then, TTO solution was buffered to pH = 7 with 0.165 M morpholinepropanesulfonic acid (MOPS) (Sigma-Aldrich). The final TTO concentrations ranged from 4% to 0.0017% ( v/ v). Tween 80 (Sigma-Aldrich) (final concentration 0.001%, v/ v) was used to enhance the essential oil solubility [ 11]. TTO was protected from light and humidity and maintained at 4 Â°C just before use [ 8, 11].
